description.value:
Refined Frenzon, User gains Battle Rage Talent for 3d10 Rounds per dose. May (GM dependant) require Frenzon to give Frenzy Talent if user doesn't have it.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
